site.companyName: Al-Mashreq AL-mutahaduh General Trading Company LLC

home.qualityIntro: We are committed to quality and safety standards in all our products and services, and we work with internationally certified suppliers and agencies.
home.partnersTagline: Authorized distributors and agents for global brands
home.ctaIntro: For inquiries or a quote, call us or message us on WhatsApp.

content.aboutText: Al-Mashreq mutahaduh General Trading Company LLC was established in 1992, with over three decades of experience in distributing oils, filters, batteries, and service center operations. We are committed to quality and safety standards and work with international agencies and brands. We offer wholesale and retail solutions and service centers in multiple locations.
content.vision: To be the first choice for customers in oils, filters, batteries, and maintenance services in Iraq and the region.
content.mission: To provide high-quality products and services with safety and trust, and to build long-term partnerships with customers and partners.
qualityPolicyPoints: Commitment to quality and safety standards in all products and services.
Selecting internationally certified suppliers and agencies.
Listening to customer feedback and continuous improvement.
content.servicesIntro: We offer wholesale and retail distribution, service centers, and industrial and environmental solutions.

oils.title: Oils
oils.description: Distribution of engine and industrial oils, wholesale and retail, from certified global brands.

filters.title: Filters
filters.description: High-quality oil, air, and fuel filters for all types of vehicles and machinery.

batteries.title: Batteries
batteries.description: Car and vehicle batteries from certified agencies with warranty and quality.

maintenance.title: Service Centers
maintenance.description: Oil and filter changes, batteries, and general maintenance at our equipped centers.

recycling.title: Environmental Solutions
recycling.description: Plant for purifying and filtering used oils as part of our environmental commitment.

content.locationsIntro: Addresses of headquarters, branches, and service centers — call or use directions.
content.partnersIntro: We work with global brands as authorized distributors and agents (exclusive/certified/southern Iraq depending on agency).
content.partnersTagline: Authorized distributors and agents for global brands

qualityPage.intro: Our commitment to quality and safety standards in all our products and services.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: {{company}} respects your privacy. This page explains how we collect and use information when you visit our site.
privacy.infoWeCollectText: We may collect name, phone number, email, and messages you send via the contact form, only to respond to your inquiries.
privacy.useOfInfoText: We use this information to communicate with you and respond to your requests. We will not share it with third parties for marketing purposes without your consent.
privacy.updatesText: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.intro: Your use of {{company}} website means you agree to these terms.
terms.useOfSiteText: Content on this site is for informational purposes only. Use or republication of content without prior permission is not allowed.
terms.productsServicesText: Prices and details are subject to change. Please confirm details when contracting or ordering.
terms.externalLinksText: The site may contain links to other websites. We are not responsible for the content or practices of those sites.
